show.title: My Toxic Kaadhali
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/tuRsY3
show.description:
Arjun, heir to a powerful business empire, falls for Divya, a glamorous social media influencer. But behind her charm lies obsession and a hunger for status. When his elegant and youthful-looking mother Mrs. Archana returns, Divya mistakes her for Arjun’s secret lover — and chaos begins.
What starts as a love story turns into a fierce war between a possessive bride and a grieving mother. Lies are exposed, bonds are broken, and everything plays out under the ruthless spotlight of social media.
In a world where love turns toxic, who will win — the influencer chasing power, or the mother seeking justice?

What starts as a love story turns into a fierce war between a possessive bride and a grieving mother. Lies are exposed, bonds are broken, and everything plays out under the ruthless spotlight of social media.
In a world where love turns toxic, who will win — the influencer chasing power, or the mother seeking justice?

author.name: Shafin Prem
author.bio: delivering the best in your feed
